markdownRemark.excerpt: Mobile-accessible web application used by field technicians to order repair and installation of service drops. This tool consolodated andâ€¦
markdownRemark.html:
Mobile-accessible web application used by field technicians to order repair and installation of service drops. This tool consolodated and replaced three separate drop escalation applications.

Throughout the development of this application, I proactively organized and led weekly change management meetings, prioritized the project backlog, and designed, developed, validated, and delivered changes to the system and its related business processes. I proactively built relationships and worked closely with members of the DCCoE, the Yield Management Team, the PureFibre Build Support Team, I&R, CSD Coaching and Learning Solutions, and CSD Communications to successfully deliver this application.

frontmatter.title: Broadband Networks Business Intelligence Team JIRA Front Door
